summary: Lord Byron, poet Percy Shelley, his future wife, Mary Shelley (writing Frankenstein) and others spend the summer of 1816 together.
cast: Hugh Grant|Lizzy McInnerny|Valentine Pelka|Elizabeth Hurley|José Luis Gómez|Virginia Mataix|Ronan Vibert|José Carlos Rivas|Kate McKenzie|Jolyon Baker|Terence Taplin|Karen Westwood|Bibiana Fernández|Josep Maria Pou|Aitana Sánchez-Gijón|Rebecca Ordovas|Nicolás Moser|Néstor Alfonso Rojas|María Teresa Ainscough|Alan Griffin|Yolanda Constant|John Ticehurst|Miguel Picazo|Richard Burr|Emma Amos|Silvia Casanova|Paco Catalá
keywords: male frontal nudity|horseback riding|killing an animal|dog|poisoning an animal
title: Remando al viento
